description: This file defines API endpoints for managing 'skills' in a learning platform. It includes CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) for skills, as well as listing skills and their associated modules. The endpoints are built using FastAPI and interact with a database via SQLAlchemy ORM models.

methods.name: list_skills( subject_slug: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by subject slug (topic)"), level: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by progression level: Beginner|Intermediate|Advanced"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieve a list of skills, optionally filtered by subject slug and level.

methods.name: create_skill(payload: SkillCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Create a new skill entry in the database, after validation.

methods.name: get_skill(skill_slug: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieve details of a specific skill by its slug.

methods.name: update_skill(skill_slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any], db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Update an existing skill identified by its slug with new data.

methods.name: delete_skill(skill_slug: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Soft delete a skill by setting its 'deleted' flag to True.

methods.name: list_modules_for_skill(skill_slug: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: List modules associated with a specific skill by its slug.
